about_the_game:
Welcome to Magic Cube in Strange World!

This is my first game, made on my own as an independent.

You've been teleported to this strange world where nothing makes sense.



You're not even human anymore, you're a cube.
Does this world even have a purpose?
You have a grappling hook and your goal is to reach the top of this strange course.
Can you reach the top without falling?



Can you find all the items to unlock the shortcuts?
Only you can find out.

Gameplay and features:

- The game is played from a third-person perspective.
- The aim of the game is to climb to the top of the course to reach the finish line, which is a magical portal.
- Using a grappling hook, jump and double jump, you can move from platform to platform and object to object.
- There are objects to collect that unlock mirrors, which are trampolines, to climb faster.
- There's a day/night cycle, so at night you have a torch to activate to see where you're going.
- You'll also find teleporters to take you further along the map.
- There's also an aiming system that switches you to 1st-person view, helping you use the grappling hook for your ascent.

Good luck!
